page.title: 09A School Day
page.content: The school day begins at 9 o'clock with registration. At ten past nine we have an Assembly. In today's Assembly our Headmistress told us the story of Caedmon. After that we sung a hymn and said a prayer. After Assembly we have a lesson which is usually mathematics.We tackle tasks such as fractions, area and volume.Sometimes we work from books or we may use our computer. After the lesson we have a break from work. Lunch is cooked in the school kitchen. After lunch we have an integrated session when we work in small groups on different subjects. This is followed by games, music or story until home time at 3 o'clock. Once each week we go by coach to the swimming baths at Wyndham Comprehensive School at Egremont.
